reviews.review: Only play this game if you can handle toxic people and memeing. Mostly a strategy game honestly. The horror aspect is also there and I like how often they add things to the game. Literally bought this game because my friend begged me to and now I am addicted to it. Needs work on balancing some things but overall a 8/10.

This game is heavily skewed towards the killer, there is little to escape the killer, their movement speed is far greater, and as far as the game as a whole friday the 13th is much more balanced and more fun with friends. This is rage inducing by yourself and irritating at best with friends as the being the killer is the only "enjoyable role" in this game. Its really not oriented towards a team effort and yes there are strategies but the most effective for (winning) is just hiding in a locker waiting for randos to die for you to escape. Honestly not impressed.

The game idea is solid, but when I got it to play with my friends the matchmaking set us against killers much more skilled and further progressed (I guess because we were in a party?). We got crushed repeatedly until it wasn't fun and I wish I could refund. If you are new and want to play with friends, don't buy it. Also, it bugs the mouse when you close the game.

One of my fave game so far on steam. I play this all the time with my friends and we enjoy it every single time/all day.

loved this game for the first couple hundred hours, but eventually turns into a game where winning or losing isn't fun anymore.

Survivor queues are long and gameplay when not in a chase is holding down the left click button and looking around with some side objectives of holding left click on a bone totem or going to rescue someone. Chases can feel unfair if it is a strong or high tier killer with meta perks.

Then you play as killer, where it's you up against 4 other survivors. You try to avoid the same bs tactics as a killer that you faced when you were a survivor, only to not get a single kill, survivors healing extremely quick due to new totem perks, watching corners for flashlights, etc etc. These games end with all remaining survivors tbagging at the exit gate and flashlight clicks in sync with each other.

Then you begin to think, wow, killer / survivor is so weak compared to the other side. The truth is, it doesn't matter, it's the toxic community that once again ruins a game. When you have such limited time to play games and many games offer actual fair and fun experiences, it makes it very hard to come back to this game that I once loved.

The cherry on top is when the devs "test" new features in their public test environment, such as adding a new killer, and release to the main branch of the game, features unrelated to the addition (maps) break and are locked for months. If you want a buggy game full of spaghetti code and no testing, and don't mind unsportsmanship like conduct because you have no self respect for yourself, then perhaps this game is for you.

Overall it is fun. There are some toxic people out there but if you let the game get to you it wont be fun. After all this is just a game.

Купил со скидкой, играешь постоянно с и*иотами, которые подставляют постоянно, не понимают что делать нужно и когда. Механика не проработана, куча ошибок, багов.  Часто вылетает с сервера, якобы пропало интернет соединение, лишают возможности начать игру. По факту ни обрыва ни потерь интернета нет.  очень много косяков по игре с персонажами. За полную стоимость не купил бы никогда, к слову, пожалел, что даже со скидкой взял + доп контент на духа и гост фейса.
Спустя 4 месяца игры мнение игры не изменилось. Бесперебойный постоянный, стабильный интернет подводил не более 1 раза за 6-7 мес. В случае же с игрой постоянно после отключения от сервера, дают блокировку за лив и сообщение- вы потеряли соединение с хостом. Систематически, по несколько раз за месяц. 
Тема багов остается. Лично имея пинг 60> ударяя выжившего наблюдаю, как те бегут и через секунду еще умудряются перепрыгнуть через окно/поваленную доску. Игра не стоит той цены, что есть в стиме. 180 потолок, со скидкой можно взять по фану поиграть, потратив себе по итогу нервы...
Норм

Awful game, awful developers and for the most part an awful player base. The matchmaking and ranking systems ruin the game, especially with console players. Killers are overpowered and survivors don't understand the need or refuse to work together, which is the only way to win. There's a reason the developers abandoned their other game "Deathgarden Bloodharvest", because they're terrible and only care about making money off in game cosmetic items. Don't waste your time or money.
love it

É um jogo bom até, quando funciona direito, o que é o grande problema. Sempre tem um erro novo acontecendo, o que faz com que você perca mais tempo procurando soluções para eles do que jogando. E sim, você tem que procurar, pois o suporte do jogo é simplesmente o mesmo ou menos que nada. Já logo aviso que você provavelmente vai se estressar com um negócio chamado EAC, que vai "inventar" literalmente algum erro pra te quitar de uma partida. E quando você voltar, vai ficar na fila de punição como se a culpa fosse sua. 

A comunidade deste jogo é bem tóxica, sempre tem algo tosco para falarem. A maioria são seres humanos com ânus no lugar da boca. 

De resto é um jogo bom. Não recomento pra quem tem problemas com ansiedade e estresse. 

Ps: Jogue no gráfico mais baixo possível, porque faz pouca diferença e vai deixar algumas mapas mais claros e menos lagados. 

Boa sorte. 

Ps²: Escrevi essa análise enquanto faço uma correção de erro. Pois é, essa é a vida de quem quer jogar esse jogo.
